channel.title: Road to the Olympics
channel.itunes:author: Stephen Scullion
channel.description: Follow my journey from Tokyo 2020 Olympics to Paris 2024, attempting to make Rio Olympics a quad tear put those plans on hold,Tokyo was a tough Olympics for me, but the knowledge there will help me make Paris an Olympics to remember. Enjoy the Journey

item.itunes:title: Mental aspect of Running - IT'S only running, one foot in front of the other.
item.title: Mental aspect of Running - IT'S only running, one foot in front of the other.
item.description:
Sometimes I can be super emotional, and I've learnt to deal with that slightly better. If I look back at all my "regrets" both in sport / life, usually it boils down to emotional decisions. Dealing with the mental sides of athletics can be tough, "BUT actually, I don't think it's that tough" we just let it over whelm us. If you think about running logically. IT'S only running.Â

item.itunes:title: Are you trying your hardest?
item.title: Are you trying your hardest?
item.description:
One of my favorite quotes, is Dave Brailsford, and it essentially suggests if you're not doing everything you possibly can, to be the best version of yourself, you can't expect to win. However if you're willing to do everything you possibly can, that gives you the BEST possible chance of winning. Simple really, just do everything you can to win.
